member.name: T:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest
member.summary: This class represents HTTP and HTTPS requests.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AllowAutoRedirect
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the request should handle redirects, if the response have sufficient information.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to buffer the data sent to server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.MaximumAutomaticRedirections
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum redirection attempts to complete the request.
member.remarks: Default value is 50.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.CookieContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets the cookie container for the request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Accept
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Accept header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Connection
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Connection header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Content-Type header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.ContentLength
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Content-Length header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.SendChunked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to send request content in 'chunked' mode.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Expect
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Expect header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Expect100Continue
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically add 'Expect: 100-continue' header to the request.
Default value is true.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.ContinueTimeout
member.summary:
Gets or sets a timeout in milliseconds, which determines how long to wait for the '100 Continue' response from the server. If the '100 Continue' response is not received within the timeout, request body is send to the server.
Zero means no waiting.
Default value is 350.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.HaveResponse
member.summary: Gets a value whether the response was already received for this request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.IfModifiedSince
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP If-Modified-Since header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.KeepAlive
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Connection header with proper values associated with keep alive mode.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP method that this request uses.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Headers
member.summary: Get or sets a collection of HTTP headers to send with a request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Referer
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP Referer header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Address
member.summary: Gets target URI final request connects to. When redirected, this is the URI the final response is retrieved.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.RequestUri
member.summary: Gets original URI of the request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time in milliseconds before the operation times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from to server. This also means that data transfers only time out after x milliseconds of inactivity, not after x milliseconds from the start of the transfer.
Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Credentials
member.summary: Get or sets network credentials to identify a user.
member.remarks: Only object derived from class is valid value.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.ConnectionGroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection group for the request. Not supported yet.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Indicates whether to pre-authenticate the request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.UserAgent
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP User-Agent header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AutomaticDecompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the method(s) that can be used for automatic decompression of the response stream; Both and by default.
member.remarks: This property sets Accept-Encoding header if and only if the header is not set explicitly using collection before the request is sent. If the response encoding meets some of the methods set, the response stream gets decompressed automatically; otherwise, no decompression is used.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.ClientCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of client certificates for the request.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.#ctor(System.Uri,Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator)
member.summary: Create a HTTP request targeting specific URI.
member.returns: Request to target URI.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AddRange(System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds HTTP Range header to the request with 'bytes' unit.
member.param: The position (zero-based) at which the data starts. Negative number means the offset is relative to the end of the data.

example.para: = 100 results to "Range: bytes=100-", which means: from position 100 to the end of data.
= -100 results to "Range: bytes=-100", which means: the last 100 bytes of the data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AddRange(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds HTTP Range header to the request.
member.param: The position (zero-based) at which the data starts. Negative number means the offset is relative to the end of the data.

example.para: = 100 results to "Range: bytes=100-", which means: from position 100 to the end of data.
= -100 results to "Range: bytes=-100", which means: the last 100 bytes of the data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AddRange(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds HTTP Range header to the request with 'bytes' unit.
member.param: The position (zero-based) from which to start the data.
The position (inclusive) where the data ends.

example.para: "Range: bytes=0-0" retrieves the first byte of the data.
"Range: bytes=0-9" retrieves the first ten bytes of the data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.AddRange(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds HTTP Range header to the request.
member.param: The position (zero-based) from which to start the data.
The position (inclusive) where the data ends.

example.para: "Range: bytes=0-0" retrieves the first byte of the data.
"Range: bytes=0-9" retrieves the first ten bytes of the data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous GetRequestStream operation. Returns request stream that the request data can be written to as an asynchronous operation. Returns writable stream.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous GetResponse operation. Returns a response for this request as asynchronous operation. If the response was retrieved once, return that response.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.EndGetRequestStream(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous BeginGetRequestStream operation.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.
member.returns: Returns writable stream.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.EndGetResponse(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous BeginGetResponse operation.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.
member.returns: Returns a response for this request.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.Abort
member.summary: Cancels request. This will make the current (or subsequent) request fail with error with Status of .

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.GetRequestStream
member.summary: Returns request stream that the request data can be written to.
member.returns: Returns writable stream.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.GetRequestStreamAsync
member.summary: Returns request stream that the request data can be written to as an asynchronous operation. Returns writable stream.
member.returns: Task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.GetResponse
member.summary: Returns a response for this request. If the response was retrieved once, return that response.
member.returns: Returns a response for this request.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequest.GetResponseAsync
member.summary: Returns a response for this request as asynchronous operation. If the response was retrieved once, return that response.
member.returns: Task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator
member.summary: Implements an interface for creating HTTP requests.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.ValidatingCertificate
member.summary: Occurs when a server certificate needs to be validated.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.Settings
member.summary: Gets TLS/SSL settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.LogWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the log writer used by this object.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.
member.remarks: The object set on this proxy instance is ignored when creating HTTP requests, the object is used instead.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.SetSocketFactory(Rebex.Net.ISocketFactory)
member.summary: Sets the socket factory to be used to create communication sockets.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of HTTP request creator.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.Register
member.summary: Registers this creator with WebRequest to handle HTTP and HTTPS requests (replacing System.Net.HttpWebRequest).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.Create(System.Uri)
member.summary: Create a HTTP request targeting specific URI.
member.returns: Request to target URI.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Create a HTTP request targeting specific URI.
member.returns: Request to target URI.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse
member.summary: This class represents HTTP and HTTPS responses.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.ContentLength
member.summary: Gets a value of HTTP Content-Length header of this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.ContentType
member.summary: Gets a value of HTTP Content-Type header of this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Headers
member.summary: Gets a collection of HTTP header of this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Cookies
member.summary: Gets a collection of HTTP cookies associated with this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Cipher
member.summary: Gets information about the TLS/SSL cipher (if TLS/SSL is in use).

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets HTTP protocol version of this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.ResponseUri
member.summary: Gets a uri that responsed to the request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Server
member.summary: Gets a value of HTTP Server header of this response.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.GetResponseStream
member.summary: Returns a stream that contains data of the response.
member.returns: Stream containing response data, like html page, SOAP response and so on.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets a status code of the response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.StatusDescription
member.summary: Gets a status code description.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.CharacterSet
member.summary: Gets a character set that is used in response Content-Type HTTP header.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding
member.summary: Gets a value of HTTP Content-Encoding header of this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Method
member.summary: Gets a HTTP method that a request used when received this response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.LastModified
member.summary: Gets a value of the Last-Modified header, which indicates the last modification date and time of the resource.

remarks.para: If the Last-Modified header is missing, the received time is used.
If the Last-Modified header cannot be parsed, the is thrown.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpResponse.Close
member.summary: Closes the response stream returned by method.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.HttpSettings
member.summary: Specifies various HTTP/HTTPS settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.HttpSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpSettings.HttpSessionCacheEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTTP session cache is enabled (default is true).
member.remarks: HTTP session cache is used for keep-alive connections.
member.value: True when cache is enabled; false when disabled.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpSettings.HttpSessionCacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time in milliseconds for caching HTTP sessions (default is 50000 = 50 seconds). Minimal allowed value is 5000.
member.remarks: HTTP session cache is used for keep-alive connections.
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, for caching HTTP sessions.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.HttpSettings.SslSessionCacheEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TLS/SSL session cache is enabled (default is true).
member.value: True when cache is enabled; false when disabled.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.WebClient
member.summary: Provides simple methods to upload and download data from HTTP/HTTPS servers.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.WebClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.WebClient.#ctor(Rebex.Net.HttpRequestCreator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified HTTP request creator. This enables sharing keep-alive connections between instances of and . However please note that , and properties are shared between all instances as well. This means that changing such property affects behavior of all instances as well.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time in milliseconds before the request times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out; minimal value is 1000).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds). Minimal value is 1000 (1 second).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from to server. This also means that data transfers only time out after x milliseconds of inactivity, not after x milliseconds from the start of the transfer.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.LogWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the LogWriter used by this object.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.WebClient.SetSocketFactory(Rebex.Net.ISocketFactory)
member.summary: Sets the socket factory to be used to create communication sockets.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the base address to simplify multiple requests to one server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Headers
member.summary: Get or sets a collection of HTTP headers to send with a request.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.ResponseHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of HTTP headers associated with the response.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Credentials
member.summary: Get or sets network credentials to identify a user.
member.remarks: Only object derived from class is valid value.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Settings
member.summary: Gets TLS/SSL settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClient.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding to be used for string upload and download.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.WebClient.ValidatingCertificate
member.summary: Occurs when a server certificate needs to be validated.

member.summary: Occurs when upload progress has changed.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when download progress has changed.

member.summary: Opens a stream that contains data retrieved from provided URI.

member.remarks: HTTP method GET is used to retrieve the data.

member.summary: Gets the total number of bytes transferred during the current transfer.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.WebClientProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal
member.summary: Gets the total number of bytes to be transferred (or null if not available).
member.value: Total number of bytes to be transferred.
member.remarks: Value of null indicates that this information is not available.

member.name: T:Rebex.Legacy.WebClientExtensions

member.name: M:Rebex.Legacy.WebClientExtensions.BeginOpenRead(Rebex.Net.WebClient,System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous OpenRead operation. Opens a stream that contains data retrieved from provided URI.

remarks.p: HTTP method GET is used to retrieve the data.
In builds for .NET 4.0 and higher, this method is available as an extension method. Add 'using Rebex.Legacy' (C#) or 'Import Rebex.Legacy' (VB.NET) to your code in order to use it.

member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: Opened stream with data retrieved from provided URI.

member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Legacy.WebClientExtensions.BeginUploadFile(Rebex.Net.WebClient,System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous UploadFile operation. Uploads a data to provided URI and returns a response data of the upload operation.
member.param: HTTP method to use when sending the data.

remarks.p: HTTP method POST is used when method is set to null (Nothing in VB).
In builds for .NET 4.0 and higher, this method is available as an extension method. Add 'using Rebex.Legacy' (C#) or 'Import Rebex.Legacy' (VB.NET) to your code in order to use it.

member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Legacy.WebClientExtensions.EndUploadFile(Rebex.Net.WebClient,System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous BeginUploadFile operation.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.
member.returns: Response data of the upload operation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Legacy.WebClientExtensions.BeginUploadValues(Rebex.Net.WebClient,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
